title: Are Argentina World Cup Favorites?
description:
The FC crew discuss Argentina's chances at lifting the World Cup trophy this winter and what their biggest threat is to prevent them from winning. The panel dive into harry Maguire's performances by questioning whether his best days at Manchester United are behind him and ponder Christian Pulisic's comments on Thomas Tuchel in his upcoming book.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Argentina's World Cup hopes; Analyzing Harry Maguire's performances at Man United; Pulisic's complaint about Tuchel
